jobDescription: Seeking talented mid-level UX designer to join a fun, fast paced FinTech product team within a global F500 financial company. This is a (W2) hourly role (full time hours, subsidized med/dental/vision benefits, on-site in San Francisco) which intends to convert to a full time employment.  You’ll join a dynamic team that focuses on creating & enhancing the future of mobile banking.  In this role, you'll bring a holistic UX design background and will provide simple, fun and innovatively enriching mobile experiences. You will deliver experiences through effective artifacts (from Customer Journeys & Ecosystem Maps to Participatory Design Prototypes & Wireframes).  Finally, you are a customer experience advocate, excited about our customer’s lives through simple, intelligent products and experiences.​ Qualifications:3+ years experience as a UX designer or service designer  * Demonstrated understanding of the full UX process & creation of artifacts  * Strong prototyping skills (Principle or other prototyping tool)  * Developing ability to incorporate user needs, business needs, and technical constraints/opportunities into the product development processDemonstrated ability to create work product that shows design intentAbility to handle multiple priorities / (sometimes changing) timelines  * Strong / polished communication skills  * Comfortable collaborating with senior leadership partners  * MOBILE experience is a PLUS  * WEARABLES experience is a PLUS  * SERVICE DESIGN expertise is a PLUS
